front.title: Methodology for Benchmarking MPLS-TE Fast Reroute Protection

abstract.t: This document describes the methodology for benchmarking MPLS Protection mechanisms for link and node protection as defined in [RFC4090]. This document provides test methodologies and testbed setup for measuring failover times while considering all dependencies that might impact faster recovery of real-time applications bound to MPLS traffic engineered (MPLS-TE) tunnels.
